#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int T; cin >> T;
  while( T-- ){
    string a,b; cin >> a; cin >> b;
    sort(a.begin(), a.end());
    sort(b.begin(), b.end());

    if ( a == b )
      cout << "YES" << endl;
    else
      cout << "NO" << endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
